item.description:
Hallo alle!
Endlich eine Einladung:
Willkommen alle Deutschsprechende Leute!
We have a long-awaited invitation to Kaffeeklatsch from our own Bob Yeager for a German brunch at his fabulous house in Glastonbury. This is partly to celebrate our 100th Meetup! It is open to regular Kaffeeklatsch members and to those who haven't been able to attend before. If you have never been to his house, you will be amazed and surprised by his very interesting and creatively-designed house and gardens. A bit of Europe in Glastonbury!
Your contribution of some food for the brunch table would be appreciated. Hours are 10:30-12:30.
This will be a fun time!
Please RSVP on this site- that will be much easier for the organizer.
item.how_to_find_us: Walk down the driveway and around the back to his German party room!
item.name: Brunch bei Bob
